title: Check up on what SkiaSharp is doing with resizing of images
body:
There are a fe issues talking about the quality and performance with image resizing:

 - https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/520
 - https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/319

We are working on a much later version of skia, so things may be better soon. But, just to keep track that this is an issue that exists.

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body: Performance on Windows might be improved by https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1007

comments.author: ViRuSTriNiTy
comments.body:
Since the linked issues are auto-closed, I post it here. Resized images are still blurry with quality parameter set to `100` when using `SKBitmap`.  

Can someone share the status of the whole resize dilemma here?

comments.author: ggolda
comments.body: Any update on this issue as well? Still blurry in 2023
